title: 道德經
source: Chinese Text Project (ctext.org) - James Legge translation

passages.zh: 反者道之動；弱者道之用。
passages.en: (Dispensing with the use (of means)) The movement of the Dao by contraries proceeds; And weakness marks the course of Dao's mighty deeds.

passages.zh: 天下萬物生於有，有生於無。
passages.en: All things under heaven sprang from It as existing (and named); that existence sprang from It as non-existent (and not named).
